name: Gotcha Number for Playdate
summary:
OK Inspector! You are kidnapped! Gotcha! You must figure out how to escape the room within 10 minutes...and then... your time is up!! Got your number!! Point and click and piece clues together... Use your magnifying glass and search around. It reminds me a little of the first part of Dove and War game, but without WW2 theme...

Tilt to look around room. Hurry!

P.S. Now with answer video!
